title: Lily the Cat
description: Lily the cat woke up from her nap and decided to look around the house. What will Lily see as she goes around the house? Lily the Cat provides the opportunity for students to retell the story as well as sequence events. Illustrations support the text. High-frequency words and repetitive phrases make this book a great choice for beginning readers.
reviewWords: circled, couch, crossed, curled, jumped, strolled
awareness: Segment Onset and Rime                : Segment onset and rime
grammar: Past-Tense Verbs                : Identify and use past tense verbs
wordWork: Position Words                : Identify and use position words
